duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate and update the Facilities preventative maintenance schedule and work tasks in IFS ERP system.
Provide technical assistance to production for difficult facility equipment troubleshooting.
Assist in the design/development and implementation of new manufacturing facilities, equipment, and processes.
Manage and complete projects to make equipment and facility improvements for reduced costs and/or improved quality.
Coordinates project work with outside contractors and equipment suppliers, as well as internal facilities, maintenance, and operations teams.
Ensure all facility systems meet the requirements of national and local codes (i.e. OSHA, NFPA, NEC, DHEC, etc.)

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (B.S.) in Mechanical or other engineering field from four-year college or university; and a minimum of 5 years related experience and/or training.
